latitude.description: The latitude of the geographical location

longitude.description: The longitude of the geographical location

heading.description: The compass heading of the vessel in degrees

courseMadeGood.description: The direction in which the vessel is traveling, in degrees

speedOverGround.description: The velocity of the vessel in meters per second (m/s) over the ground

speedThroughWater.description: The velocity of the vessel in meters per second (m/s) through the water

numberOfSatellites.description: The number of satellites used to calculate the position
